suite.name: Carrinho Test

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '42', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=email=testenul5%40exemplo.com&password=123

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: DELETE On Session
kw.doc: Sends a DELETE request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
